results.description: Members of the Russia biathlon team are investigated over alleged doping offences at the 2017 World Championships in Austria.
results.title: Russia biathletes investigated for doping at 2017 World Championships in Austria

results.description: Ski and snowboard coach Euan Baxter tells Personal Best how being on the slopes can aid our mental wellbeing.
results.shortTitle: 'You're really in charge of your own destiny'
results.title: BBC Get Inspired: Snowsports and mindfulness

results.description: Fredrik Lindstroem leads Sweden to gold in the men's 4x7.5 km relay, with Norway taking silver and bronze going to Germany.
results.shortTitle: Sweden win men's biathlon 4x7.5 km relay gold
results.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Sweden win men's biathlon 4x7.5 km relay gold

results.description: Sweden win men's 4x7.5km biathlon relay gold at the Winter Olympics as Fredrik Lindstrom holds his nerve in a thrilling contest with Norway's Emil Hegle Svendsen.
results.title: Winter Olympics: Fredrik Lindstrom leads Sweden to first biathlon relay gold

results.description: Darya Domracheva crosses the line first in the Women's 4x6km relay to hand Belarus their second gold medal, before suffering an embarrassing moment in the victory celebration.
results.shortTitle: When gold medal celebrations go wrong
results.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Belarus's Darya Domracheva suffers embarrassing moment while celebrating gold medal victory

results.description: Belarus win women's biathlon relay gold as Darya Domracheva claims her fourth Winter Olympic title.
results.shortTitle: Belarus win women's biathlon relay gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Belarus win women's biathlon relay gold

results.description: Watch highlights as Martin Fourcade becomes France's most successful Olympian, winning his fifth gold medal after he anchors the biathlon team to victory in Pyeongchang.
results.shortTitle: France's Fourcade makes history with biathlon relay gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Martin Fourcade becomes France's greatest Olympian with biathlon relay gold

thumbnail.altText: Fourcade France's greatest Olympian with biathlon relay gold

results.description: Martin Fourcade becomes France's most successful Olympian of all-time by anchoring his side to victory in the biathlon mixed relay.

results.description: France's Martin Fourcade edges out Germany's Simon Schempp in a stunning finish in the men's biathlon 15km mass start at the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang.
results.shortTitle: Biathlon produces 'One of the best finishes ever'
results.title: Winter Olympics: Biathlon produces 'One of the best finishes ever'

results.description: Martin Fourcade finally claims Winter Olympic gold in stunning finish to the men's biathlon 15km mass start.
results.shortTitle: Photo finish gives Fourcade biathlon gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Martin Fourcade wins gold in biathlon photo finish

results.title: Winter Olympics: Kuzmina wins her second medal in the biathlon

results.description: Anastasiya Kuzmina leads from start to finish to win the women's biathlon 12.5km mass start event at the Winter Olympics.

results.description: Norway's Johannes Thingnes Bo wins gold with a superb skiing display in the 20km individual biathlon.

results.description: Sweden's Hanna Oberg wins gold in the women's biathlon 15km individual event following a perfect shooting performance.

results.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Sweden's Hanna Oberg wins biathlon gold

results.description: Sweden's Hanna Oberg hits all 20 targets en route to a surprise win in the women's 15km individual biathlon at the Winter Olympics.

results.description: Frenchman Martin Fourcade becomes the first biathlete to defend the pursuit title just 24 hours after a disastrous showing in the sprint event.
results.shortTitle: Biathlon gold medal redemption for Fourcade
results.title: Winter Olympics: Biathlon gold for Martin Fourcade

results.description: Martin Fourcade brushes off his biathlon sprint disappointment to become the first man to defend the 12.5km Olympic pursuit title.
results.title: Winter Olympics: Frenchman Martin Fourcade becomes first man to defend biathlon pursuit title

results.description: Laura Dahlmeier becomes the first person to win an Olympic sprint-pursuit biathlon double after winning the women's 10km pursuit in Pyeongchang.
results.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Laura Dahlmeier makes biathlon history
